docs.lead_paragraph: Contributions received through THE NEW YORK TIMES yesterday, for the Hundred Neediest Cases, amounted to $1,954.38, making a total of $30,429.47 for the eight days since the first appeal was printed.

headline.main: FUND FOR NEEDIEST STILL LAGS BEHIND; Total for Eight Days Reaches Only $30,429, Against $58,-- 409 Last Year. BARUCH SENDS $500 His Family Foregoes Own Gifts for Poor--Sacrifice Means Happiness for Many. ONCE NEEDY HELP OTHERS Homes Desolate and Holding Affliction Last Year Now Contented Through Times Appeal.

docs.snippet: Contributions received through THE NEW YORK TIMES yesterday, for the  Hundred Neediest Cases, amounted to $1,954.38, making a total of $30,429.47 for the eight days since the first appeal was printed.
